net.adamcin.oakpal.maven.mojo

Class ScanArtifactMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • net.adamcin.oakpal.maven.mojo.ScanArtifactMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="scan",
      requiresDependencyResolution=TEST,
      configurator="oakpal",
      defaultPhase=VERIFY)
public class ScanArtifactMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Scans the main project artifact by simulating package installation and listening for violations reported by the configured scriptReporters.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Field Detail

      • skip

        @Parameter(property="oakpal.scan.skip")
public boolean skip
        Specifically skip this plugin's execution.

      • preInstallArtifacts

        @Parameter(name="preInstallArtifacts")
protected List<org.apache.maven.model.Dependency> preInstallArtifacts
        Specify a list of content-package artifacts to download and pre-install before the scanned packages.

        For example: 

         <preInstallArtifacts>
   <preInstallArtifact>
     <groupId>com.adobe.acs</groupId>
     <artifactId>acs-aem-commons-content</artifactId>
     <version>3.9.0</version>
     <type>zip</type>
   </preInstallArtifact>
 </preInstallArtifacts>
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • preInstallFiles

        @Parameter(name="preInstallFiles")
protected List<File> preInstallFiles
        Specify a list of content package files by path to pre-install, which have already been built or downloaded in a previous phase.
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • cndNames

        @Parameter(name="cndNames")
protected List<String> cndNames
        Specify a list of Compact NodeType Definition (CND) resource names (to discover in the test-scope classpath) to import before any packages are installed during the scan. This is usually necessary for proprietary CRX applications like AEM.
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • cndFiles

        @Parameter(name="cndFiles")
protected List<File> cndFiles
        Specify a list of Compact NodeType Definition (CND) files to import before any packages are installed during the scan. This is usually necessary for proprietary CRX applications like AEM. Use "Tools - Export Node Type" in CRX/de lite to export all nodetypes and save it to a file in your project code base.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • slingNodeTypes

        @Parameter(name="slingNodeTypes")
protected boolean slingNodeTypes
        Enable automatic discovery and installation of CND files referenced in Sling-Nodetypes Manifest headers on the class path.
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • jcrNamespaces

        @Parameter(name="jcrNamespaces")
protected List<JcrNs> jcrNamespaces
        Specify a list of additional JCR namespaces to register before installing any packages for the scan.

        For example: 

         <jcrNamespaces>
   <jcrNamespace>
     <prefix>crx</prefix>
     <uri>http://www.day.com/crx/1.0</uri>
   </jcrNamespace>
 </jcrNamespaces>
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • jcrPrivileges

        @Parameter(name="jcrPrivileges")
protected List<String> jcrPrivileges
        Specify a list of additional JCR privileges to register before installing any packages for the scan.

        For example: 

         <jcrPrivileges>
   <jcrPrivilege>crx:replicate</jcrPrivilege>
 </jcrPrivileges>
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • forcedRoots

        @Parameter(name="forcedRoots")
protected List<ForcedRoot> forcedRoots
        Specify a list of paths with associated primaryType and mixinTypes values to create in the repository before installing any packages for the scan. This should only be necessary for packages that you are pre-installing and do not have the ability to adjust to ensure that they contain the necessary DocView XML files to ensure content structure nodetype dependencies are self-contained in the package that depends on them.

        For example, to ensure that /home/users/system is created as a rep:AuthorizableFolder, you would add a forcedRoot element with a path of "/home/users/system" and a primaryType of "rep:AuthorizableFolder". 

         <forcedRoots>
   <forcedRoot>
     <path>/home/users/system</path>
     <primaryType>rep:AuthorizableFolder</primaryType>
     <mixinTypes>
       <mixinType>rep:AccessControllable</mixinType>
     </mixinTypes>
   </forcedRoot>
 </forcedRoots>
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • scriptReporters

        @Deprecated
 @Parameter(name="scriptReporters")
protected List<File> scriptReporters
        Deprecated. 0.4.0 use scriptPaths
        Specify a list of javascript files implementing the PackageCheck functions that will receive events for each scanned package.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • scriptPaths

        @Parameter(name="scriptPaths")
protected List<File> scriptPaths
        Specify a list of paths to script files implementing the ScriptPackageCheck functions that will receive events for each scanned package.
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • adhocCheckConfig

        @Parameter(name="adhocCheckConfig")
protected org.json.JSONObject adhocCheckConfig
        Specify a config object that will be provided as bindings to checks loaded via scriptPaths and classPathChecks. The Maven configuration format is normalized to an org.json.JSONObject structure.

        For example, to provide a key of foo with a value of bar 

         <adhocCheckConfig>
   <foo>bar</foo>
 </adhocCheckConfig>

        Your check script would then be able to use the value config.foo or config["foo"]

        Since:
        0.5.0

      • classPathChecks

        @Deprecated
 @Parameter(name="classPathChecks")
protected List<String> classPathChecks
        Deprecated. 0.5.0
        Specify a list of classPath resource names to locate and load as PackageChecks.
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • checks

        @Parameter(name="checks")
protected List<CheckSpec> checks
        Specify a list of Checks to locate and load as PackageChecks.
        Since:
        0.5.0

      • checklists

        @Parameter(name="checklists")
protected List<String> checklists
        Specify a list of checklist ids [ module/ ]name to enforce.
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • failOnSeverity

        @Parameter(defaultValue="MAJOR")
protected Violation.Severity failOnSeverity
        Specify the minimum violation severity level that will trigger plugin execution failure. Valid options are Violation.Severity.MINOR, Violation.Severity.MAJOR, and Violation.Severity.SEVERE.

        FYI: FileVault Importer errors are reported as MAJOR by default.

        Since:
        0.1.0
